sections.text: of denial.(RULLCA 303) A person named in a filed statement of authority granting that person authority may deliver to the Secretary of State for filing a statement of denial that:(1) provides the name of the limited liability company and the caption of the statement of authority to which the statement of denial pertains; and(2) denies the grant of authority.SourceLaws 2010, LB888, ยง 28.
